Name: Mab's Group
description:
A 44-year-old married woman from Battambang province, Mab has five children, three of whom depend on her. A child of her is in school and needs her support. To make a living, she and her husband are growing rice, fishing, raising pigs and working for others for a fee.

Mab has been with VisionFund for a cycle loan already and this time she is leading a group of two members to take out loans. As the leader of two members group, she is going to use her loan to purchase organic fertilizer, rice seeds and to pay for plowing fees. She dreams of earning more income from her rice growing business so that she can keep sending her children to school and expand her business bigger.
